## select package

|  --- | --- |

|  [DynamicOptionsGatherer](./select.dynamicoptionsgatherer.md) | Class that is used as for options gathering in dynamic way, for example from external source when writing |
|  [DynamicValueHandlerComponent](./select.dynamicvaluehandlercomponent.md) | Component used for handling current value of NgSelect, allows values which are not present in options |
|  [EditLiveSearchComponent](./select.editlivesearchcomponent.md) | Component used for obtaining edit live search html element |

|  [NgSelectDynamicModule](./select.ngselectdynamicmodule.md) | Module for select and its options, allows use of dynamic value handler |
|  [NgSelectEditDirective](./select.ngselecteditdirective.md) | Directive that applies options for NgSelect which enable usage of NgSelect edit (jira like) style |
|  [NgSelectEditModule](./select.ngselecteditmodule.md) | Module for select with editation and tags (jira like select) |
|  [NgSelectModule](./select.ngselectmodule.md) | Module for select and its options |
|  [NgSelectValuePipe](./select.ngselectvaluepipe.md) | Pipe to transform ng select selected option into |
|  [NoLiveSearchComponent](./select.nolivesearchcomponent.md) | Component used for no live search |
|  [OptGroupComponent](./select.optgroupcomponent.md) | Component used for options group in select component |
|  [OptionComponent](./select.optioncomponent.md) | Component used for options in select component |
|  [ValueHandlerBase](./select.valuehandlerbase.md) | Base class for value handlers |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ɵGetValue()](./select._getvalue.md) | Gets current value of NgSelect |
|  [ɵOnFocus(callback)](./select._onfocus.md) | Adds callback that is called each time when NgSelect gains focus |
|  [ɵSetReadonly(readonly)](./select._setreadonly.md) | Sets NgSelect as readonly, non editable |
|  [ɵSetValue(value)](./select._setvalue.md) | Sets value of NgSelect |
|  [ɵValueChange(callback)](./select._valuechange.md) | Adds callback that is called when value changes and returns subscription for this changes |
